review: Nice and easy to use. Love it.
author: Lynn Matherly

review: I hate to give anything a bad review, but the Fire TV Stick from Amazon just didn't work with my TV and Internet provider.  The Amazon technicians were very helpful, and replaced my unit two different times, but it still made no difference.  They tried everything but couldn't understand why it didn't work.  Amazon suggested that I contact my ISP, Comcast, to see if they had any suggestions.  Since I really was not having any problem with my Comcast Xfinity service, Comcast had no idea how they could help me.  All in all, it just didn't work for me, and I finally I had to send it back for credit.  The one thing that did bother me, is that they charged me a re-stocking charge.  I am a Prime member, and didn't take too kindly to the re-stocking charge.
author: John Wedge
